titleStmt.title: Samuel G. Suddarth, Receipt to William Stewart
CWG13778

availability.p: This image and transcription is publicly accessible. The image appears courtesy of the repository named in the Source Description. The transcription and annotation were undertaken by Kentucky Historical Society staff, volunteers, and interns. If referencing this document title, accession number, and permanent URL.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

msIdentifier.idno: QMG Box 10; Folder 1864 Clothing, Camp & Garrison Equipage, Telegraph Expenses, Some Claim Letters; Bundle 1

body.p:
No. 22.
THE STATE OF KENTUCKY,
To William Stewart Dr

row.cell: To Services rendered in aiding the Inspector General to organize the State Gaurd forces. for the Month of December. 1864

body.p: S G Suddarth Qr Mr Genl of Ky will pay the above acct amounting to Eighty three dollars & eighty three cents out of the Militia Fund under your control
I Certify that the above account is correct and just; that the services were rendered as stated; and that they were necessary for the public service.

D W Lindsey
Insp Genl Quarter-Master Gen. of Ky.

Received at Frankfort, Kentucky, the 23 of Dec, 1864, of S. G. SUDDARTH, Quarter-Master General of Kentucky Volunteers, the sum of Eighty three Dollars and Thirty Three Cents, in full of the above account.
(DUPLICATE.)

No. 22.
THE STATE OF KENTUCKY,
To William Stewart Dr

row.cell: To Services rendered in aiding the Inspector General to organize the State Gaurd forces, for the Month of Decr 1864. one month

body.p: S. G. Suddarth Qr Mr Genl of Ky will pay the above acct amounting to Eighty three dollars & thirty three cents out of the Militia Fund.
I Certify that the above account is correct and just; that the services were rendered as stated; and that they were necessary for the public service.

D, W, Lindsey
Quarter-Master, Insp-Gen. of Ky.

Received at Frankfort, Kentucky, the 23 of Dec, 1864, of S. G. SUDDARTH, Quarter-Master General of Kentucky Volunteers, the sum of Eighty thre Dollars and Thirty three Cents, in full of the above account.
(DUPLICATE.)

No. 22.
No. Abstract B Qr. 186.
W Stewart
Dollars 8333/100
Paid Dec 23, 1864.
